long_description: The external-frame JanSport Carson Pack is big on comfort and convenience, with the features and 80-liter capacity you need to haul large loads down long trails. Harness features ergonomic S-curve shoulder straps with a sternum strap; a dual-density hipbelt with breathable mesh helps keep you dry and comfortable. External aluminum frame adjusts to fit your torso length; it supports your load and transfers weight to your hips. Access the spacious main compartment via the top or side; floating top lid offers expandable cargo space. Hydration-compatible design features a reservoir pocket and drink tube routing for on-the-go hydration (reservoir sold separately). The JanSport Carson Pack features zippered side pockets, lid pocket, side water-bottle pockets, zippered front stash pocket, front compression straps and a webbing haul handle.
short_description: The external-frame JanSport Carson Pack is big on comfort and convenience, with the features and 80-liter capacity you need to haul large loads down long trails.
